subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Four players on the Long Island University men’s basketball team who were arrested in a campus brawl last month and suspended from school were reinstated and will each miss two games.
snippet: Four players on the Long Island University men’s basketball team who were arrested in a campus brawl last month and suspended from school were reinstated and will each miss two games.
